main event: Mr. and Mrs. Leo Heberlig observed two dark, circular objects moving rapidly in the sky over Baltimore, Maryland on May 6, 1955.
interesting points: The objects were approximately 50 feet in diameter., The objects made no sound and left no trail., They were observed for approximately 30-45 seconds before disappearing from view., The sighting is classified as unidentified based on the description provided., The witnesses were credible and the report appeared reliable.
witness description: Mr. Leo Heberlig, a businessman, and his wife, a housewife.
